snippet.title: Avatar Legends: Realms Collide - Villain Sneak Peek
snippet.description:
Fans of Avatar: The Last Airbender can now discover who is threatening the harmony of nations in the upcoming mobile strategy game, Avatar Legends: Realms Collide!

This barbaric strongman leads his followers on a march against humanity, and only the most clever Leaders and wielders of the elemental forces stand a chance of defeating him. Players will experience an original story about unraveling the mystery of the darkness that has consumed this foe.

Stay tuned for more updates, and follow Avatar Legends so you'll always hear the latest news!

👉Discord: https://discord.gg/avatarrealmscollide

👉Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/avatarrealmscollide

👉Twitter: https://twitter.com/playavatarrc

#AvatarLegends #AvatarTheLastAirbender #AvatarLegendsRealmsCollide #ATLA #Nickelodeon #ANGames #mobilegames #strategygame #newgame #teaser #teasertrailer #TiltingPoint #raiseyourgame
